body.bibl: Pennacchietti, Fabrizio A. “Significati Accessori Del Termine Siriaco per ‘Romano.’” In To a Professor Sahab: Essays and Writings in Honour of Alessandro Monti, edited by Esterino Adami and Carole Rozzonelli, 101–10. Middle East, Asian, Colonial and Postcolonial Studies, The Department of Oriental Studies, University of Turin, Italy, DOST Critical Studies 12. Alessandria: Edizioni dell’Orso, 2011.
